entries.title: This tropical survival game is scratching my Wind Waker itch by adding sailing and mysterious ruins
entries.description: The Uncharted Waters update to Len's Island practically changes the whole game.

entries.title: Finally, the prog metal album that PC gaming deserves
entries.description: WASD's second full album, Escape, has homages to everything from Deus Ex to Civilization 4.

entries.title: US senator asks Gabe Newell what Valve is doing to fight Nazis on Steam
entries.description: Senator Maggie Hassan sent a letter to the Valve boss to express concern about neo-Nazis, white supremacy, misogyny, and other "hateful" content on Steam.

entries.title: The Witcher 3 places of power: where to find all the stones in White Orchard
entries.description: Here's where to find each of White Orchard's places of power and how to unlock that Power Overwhelming achievement while you're at it.

entries.title: Friday stream: Relax with PC Gamer, Geralt, and some lo-fi Christmas jams
entries.description: We're live on Twitch with a certain hot tub and some seasonal tunes.

entries.title: For a limited time, Hunt: Showdown's map is literally on fire
entries.description: Devil's Moon takes an incendiary turn.

entries.title: Epic is giving away a free game every day in its annual Holiday Sale
entries.description: The daily giveaways run until January 5, adding up to 15 free games in all.

entries.title: Take a deep dive into underwater city builder Aquatico
entries.description: You won't have to hold your breath for long: the undersea city builder launches in January.

entries.title: Square Enix was the surprise Steam Deck champion of the year
entries.description: Almost every game Square released this year was a perfect match for Valve's handheld PC.

entries.title: Battle passes make me never want to play a multiplayer game ever again
entries.description: One of modern gaming's laziest inventions.

entries.title: Final Fantasy 14 fans can't get over its new giant goth mommy dungeon boss
entries.description: Mommy? Sorry.

entries.title: Volition's Saints Row 4 upgrade was meant to be a make-good, but it broke the game instead
entries.description: Players report issues with saves, mods, and crashes in the Re-elected Edition.

entries.title: Five very good reasons to purchase iBUYPOWER's RDY Element Hybrid Pro II
entries.description: In the market for a new gaming PC? iBUYPOWER's RDY Element Hybrid Pro II not only looks incredible, it's also an absolute powerhouse — and at an incredible price, besides.

entries.title: The 'world's smallest city builder' just had a teeny tiny launch on Steam
entries.description: The Block is a relaxing experience that lets you build teeny, tiny, yet still highly-detailed cities, and it's out today.

entries.title: Steam Controller 2. Oh no, Valve 'want to make it happen'
entries.description: "I think it's likely that we'll explore that... it's something we wanted as well."

entries.title: Henry Cavill is set to produce and star in an entire Warhammer 40K cinematic universe
entries.description: Amazon Studios has secured rights to the universe "across series, film, and more."

entries.title: Chinese players are being prepared for the end of World of Warcraft
entries.description: The current servers are due to go down in January, with no replacement partner in sight.

entries.title: We're giving away bundles of some of our favourite games from GOG
entries.description: Win a collection of crackers, including Disco Elysium and Psychonauts 2.

entries.title: Valve hints at revised Steam Deck with better battery life and screen
entries.description: A faster Deck not planned any time soon, however.

entries.title: New World is running a free weekend to highlight its new edition and discount
entries.description: Oh brave new world, that has such features in it.

entries.title: Lap it up: Henry Cavill's dog is in The Witcher 3 now
entries.description: A nice nod while Cavill's having a ruff old time.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 545 answer and hint for Friday, December 16
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #545 puzzle.

entries.title: Henry Cavill reportedly in talks to star in and produce a Warhammer 40K series for Amazon
entries.description: Yep, more Henry Cavill news. We're changing our name to HC Gamer.
